A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This was a thoroughly bad movie\, whether you are a Star Wars fan or not. Bad dialogue\, awful sub-plots that go no where\, and nonsensical scenes including Leia flying through space like Mary Poppins (this scene may mark the lowest point in the entire Star Wars cinematic universe). Episode VIII's greatest accomplishment is completing the herculean task of making a movie that is worse than the prequels.
